unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Jadeja? Heard he twisted his ankle during practice on 20/07/2024. Hope he recovers soon for the Asia Cup! Also, what about Bumrah? Is he fit after that stress fracture back in March? Last I heard, he was doing rehab at the NCA. Really hoping he's ready to bowl some jhatkas by 15/08/2024, Independence Day! And what about Prasidh Krishna? Any news after 17:00 hrs today? Need our boys firing on all cylinders!
normalised: Hey guys, any updates on Jadeja? Heard he twisted his ankle during practice on twentieth july two thousand and twenty four. Hope he recovers soon for the Asia Cup! Also, what about Bumrah? Is he fit after that stress fracture back in March? Last I heard, he was doing rehab at the N C A. Really hoping he's ready to bowl some jhatkas by fifteenth august two thousand and twenty four, Independence Day! And what about Prasidh Krishna? Any news after seventeen hundred hours today? Need our boys firing on all cylinders!
